img_above_text:
The Snake Herbalist has a basket full of poison on its back as well, so keep an eye on your status effects during this fight. Take some Antimiasma Powder when necessary.
## Snake Herbalist Spirit
img_below_text:
* **Venom Spray**
* Equipped Effect: Recovers a small amount of Health when taking Medicines.

img_summary: The image showcases the "Snake Herbalist Spirit" in the game's equipment menu. This spirit allows the player to take the form of the Snake Herbalist, enabling the ability "Venom Spray," which creates poisonous pools that inflict "Poison Bane" on enemies. The equipped effect grants a small health recovery when using medicines. The interface also provides options to equip the spirit, view its demo, and examine its details.
